title.rendered: The Dean’s List: Recipes with Paprika

content.rendered:
Welcome to the Dean’s List: your weekly destination for Deborah Berke’s most on-topic, off the beaten path rankings.

Penthouse: Deviled Eggs
7th Floor: Lentils Diavolo from NYT Cooking
6th Floor: Muhammara
5th Floor: Gumbo
4th Floor: Chicken Paprikash
Basement: Hungarian Goulash
Sub-basement: Lisa Ludwinski’s Peanut-Butter Paprika Cookies

Comments: “What’s not to like about paprika? – the almost-perfect spice.”
